featured.text: When taking medicine, we should read the instructions on the ______ carefully because they provide important information such as how and when to take it.
He made his instruction and direct so that everyone could follow easily.

definition.zh_def: 指導或命令某人如何做某事的過程或行為。
definition.en_def: A direction or order on how to do something.
definition.example: Please follow the instruction carefully to complete the task.
